tree.speaker: Rez
tree.text: Ngh-! Why are you doing this?! I'm a person too!

tree.speaker: Derenisa
tree.text: You're a disgrace. You could just pick one form and live like us, but you abuse your power. I'm only doing what I need to do.

tree.speaker: Derenisa
tree.text: I hope these guards can stop you without me. For your sake.
